widget.name: Accenture IIR
widget.description:
Experience the latest technologies of Accenture Industry Innovation Room(IIR) at the comfort of your seat. IIR is a high-tech center where it helps in visualizing the "art of the possible" for innovation-led industry value creation. You can walk through various demos that have already happened in the IIR or also watch the live stream of current demos going on.
Google Cardboard would be required for this app.
widget.author: FED Innovation Team
